attributes.action: stop British people (mostly children) being imprisoned by Egypt's ridiculous and futile Swine Flu quarantine procedures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My 8 year old son was recently placed in quarantine for 5 days on arrival in Egypt (together with numerous other British children) with suspected Swine Flu. He had no symptoms when we left the UK. Such quarantine procedures are completely futile and are against World Health Organistaion Guidelines. I want the Foreign Office to advise against all non-essential travel to Egypt until they abandon these measures.
